archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collection contains three handwritten genealogies of the Preston Family, as well as a letter from Willard Preston to Charles Aschmann.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Willard Preston Genealogy, Ms2009-121 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Willard Preston Genealogy was donated to Special Collections in 1998.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Willard Preston Genealogy commenced and was completed in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains three handwritten genealogies of the Preston Family, dating back to the 17th century. The letter to Charles Aschmann from Willard Preston was written on June 19, 1998. In the letter, Preston briefly discusses the life and deeds of certain members of the Preston Family, such as Colonel William Preston.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
